SEARCH
Package librarySE.managers.notifications

Class EmailNotifier

java.lang.Object
librarySE.managers.notifications.EmailNotifier
All Implemented Interfaces:
Notifier
public class EmailNotifier extends Object implements Notifier
EmailNotifier is a concrete implementation of Notifier that sends notifications to users via email using EmailService.

This class uses dependency injection to allow substituting a fake or mock email service during unit testing.

Usage Example:


 Notifier notifier = new EmailNotifier();
 notifier.notify(user, "ðŸ“š New Book!", "A new item was added to the library.");

Make sure your .env file contains valid SMTP credentials:

 EMAIL_USERNAME=your_email@gmail.com
 EMAIL_PASSWORD=your_app_password
Author:
Eman

      public void notify(User user, String subject, String message)
      Sends an email notification to the specified user.
      Specified by:
      notify in interface Notifier
      Parameters:
      user - recipient user (must not be null)
      subject - subject line (must not be blank)
      message - message body (must not be blank)
